main event: An unidentified fiery wheel object crashed in Bellefontaine, Ohio, on November 4, 1948, believed to be connected to a pistol flare.
interesting points: Police Chief A. D. Paden identified the object as resembling a tire rim with mysterious markings,The object lit up the area and sent onlookers running,Four witnesses confirmed seeing the object crash,The object was sent to Wright-Patterson Air Base for analysis,The investigation suggested the materials were consistent with those used in flares or explosive devices.
